title: Leading smartphone and tablet activities 2017 , by device
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of respondents on the Y-axis for 17 different Responses for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone that are presented on the X-axis.

Response E-mail had the maximum Percentage of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Smartphone. The minimum Percentage of respondents was observed in Response Trading securities/shares online for Tablet.
Among all the Responses, Smartphone had the highest Percentage of respondents in Response E-mail and lowest Percentage of respondents in Response Trading securities/shares online.
There is a gap of 50.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of respondents found for Smartphone in Response E-mail and Trading securities/shares online.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 17 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of respondents.
Out of all 2 groups, Smartphone had the highest Percentage of respondents in Response E-mail and Tablet had the lowest Percentage of respondents in Response Trading securities/shares online.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Percentage of respondents on the Y-axis for 17 different Responses for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone that are presented on the X-axis.

Response E-mail had the maximum Percentage of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Smartphone. The minimum Percentage of respondents was observed in Response Trading securities/shares online for Tablet.
Among all the Responses, Smartphone had the highest Percentage of respondents in Response E-mail and lowest Percentage of respondents in Response Trading securities/shares online.
There is a gap of 50.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of respondents found for Smartphone in Response E-mail and Trading securities/shares online.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 17 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of respondents.
In Response E-mail, Smartphone had the highest Percentage of respondents 59.0 among the 2 groups and in Trading securities/shares online, Tablet had the lowest Percentage of respondents 4.0.
Among all the Responses, Smartphone had the highest Percentage of respondents 59.0 in Response E-mail and lowest value 9.0 in Response Trading securities/shares online.

The maximum Percentage of respondents for Smartphone that was found in Response E-mail was 6.56 times larger than the minimum Percentage of respondents observed in Response Trading securities/shares online.

Among all 2 groups, Tablet had the gap of 19.0 between the maximum and minimum Percentage of respondents observed in Response Watching movies/videos online and Trading securities/shares online respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone, the Response E-mail is the maximum Percentage of respondents and Trading securities/shares online is the minimum Percentage of respondents.

data.Response: Visiting online dating websites/services or apps
